Translations.Text: say Had GOD guided mna ja bol s the righteous
Al say when it sees retribution ja get iny chance ja zavodny righteousness
ano indeed (ona robit get enough chances Moj proofs pojdem ona ona zamietnut them turned arrogant became disbeliever)
Dni Vzkriesenie ona see faces z those kto lied GOD pokryvka s misery. bol Hell nie na pravo retribution for arrogant jeden
GOD will save those maintained righteousness; He reward them. Ziaden harm touch them nor will they have any zalost
GOD bol Creator all things He bol v full control all things
Do Him belongs all decisions heavens zem those disbelieve GOD's revelations bol real losers
Say it inak than GOD ona exhort mna Je kult O ona ignorant jeden
It revealed ona a those before ona ze ona vzdy commit idol kult all tvoj robota nullified ona bol losers
Therefore ona kult GOD alone bol appreciative
They never fathom greatness GOD whole zem bol Jeho fist Dni Vzkriesenie. Skutocne universes zahyb Jeho na pravo hand He glorified He bol vela i high needing any partners
